Detailed Description

TTDCBlock in an audio processor that filters out DC Offsets from an input.

This class is a good example of a very simple audio filter that can process any number of parallel audio channels. It has a couple of simple messages, but defines no attributes beyond those that are inherited by all TTAudioObjects.

The algorithm is based on one that frequently used in Max: "biquad~ 1.0 -1.0 -0.9997 0.0"
